title: BRIEF-enX Group Says Jarrod Friedman To Resign As CFO
text:
BRIEF-enX Group Says Jarrod Friedman To Resign As CFO

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Sep 25, 2019 10:40)

© Reuters. BRIEF-enX Group Says Jarrod Friedman To Resign As CFO Sept 25 (Reuters) - enX Group Ltd : * JSE: ENX - CHANGE TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS * ENX GROUP LTD - RESIGNATION OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER * ENX GROUP LTD - JARROD FRIEDMAN HAS NOTIFIED BOARD OF HIS INTENTION TO RESIGN AS ENX'S CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER * ENX GROUP LTD - BOARD WILL CONSIDER INTERNAL AND EXTERNAL CANDIDATES IN ITS SEARCH FOR A REPLACEMENT CFO.

BRIEF-enX Group Says Jarrod Friedman To Resign As CFO
description: BRIEF-enX Group Says Jarrod Friedman To Resign As CFO
